name: Killa Kustard Remix v1
description:
This is a remix/clone of Vapetasia's Killa Kustard

It might seem simple, but that's kinda the point. Closest I've gotten to the flavor just by keeping it simple. 

Needs a pretty long steep, offnotes present at first. Might double percentages, and then steep for 3 weeks see what happens. 

Idk, check it out. It's good. 

--- DIYORDIEVAPING.COM THE LEADER IN DIY E-LIQUID DEVELOPMENT AND CONSULTATION. ---
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: very simple and very good. ADV for sure
even shake and vape itâ€™s good
Pretty close. Definitely close enough for me. Thanks Wayne.

Just mixed, the shake n' vape really has some off notes and it makes it tastes very weird, but I can really see where this is going, after a month if I remeber I'll comeback and give this review an update. Thanks for sharing it with us Wayne!
There's definitely cotton candy in killer kustard
